title: Thunderbird not saving all Recent Destinations
content: I recently updated Thunderbird to Nebula v139.0 and now my "Recent Destinations" list is not saving all my folders in its list after moving / copying emails to the destination folder I selected. It seems that the "Recent Destinations" list is only saving (or maybe just displaying) folders with names beginning with "A" - "N". If I move an email to a folder with its name beginning with "O" - "Z", the email will be moved to the appropriate / selected folder, but the folder (destination) name will NOT appear in the "Recent Destinations" list.
creator: blkalish

title: Secure connection failed
content: Every time I open Mozella the above pops up, I can still receive and send emails and every thing seems to work ok, not being computer savvy should I be concerned? Any help and suggestions would be great Many thanks Charmayne
creator: mattchar

title: Non riceve messaggi...
content: Ho acquistato 10 mesi fa il programma Dubbing AI, e circa 1 volta al mese, questo programma mi chiede ,per accedere alle funzioni, un codice di sicurezza di 6 numeri, che mi viene mandato alla email che ho usato per comprarlo ,e che utilizzo con Thunderbird. Solo che il codice non arriva piu ,e quindi il programma risulta gratuito ,quindi senza tutte le funzioni, e quindi se voglio usarlo devo ricomprarlo :( Come mai solo quei codici non li riceve piu ? Grazie
creator: omaha1944
